statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, frequency FROM public_transport_routes WHERE end_location = 'Downtown';
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency < 3 AND route_id < 10 ORDER BY start_location ASC, end_location DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency > 20 ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'City Center' ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM public_transport_routes WHERE end_location = 'Suburb' AND frequency < 15 ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT end_location, start_location, frequency FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency BETWEEN 10 AND 30 ORDER BY end_location, start_location ASC
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency > 15 AND (start_location LIKE '%Plaza%' OR end_location LIKE '%Square%')
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location='City A' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%Station%' AND end_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_name='Express Route' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 5;

SELECT route_id, route_name, schedules.departure_time, schedules.arrival_time FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id WHERE schedules.departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;

SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules, routes.route_id, routes.route_name FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id GROUP BY routes.route_id, routes.route_name HAVING total_schedules > 10 ORDER BY total_schedules DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM public_transport_stops WHERE stop_location = 'City Center' OR stop_location = 'Suburb Area';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE arrival_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM public_transport_stops WHERE stop_location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_point, end_point FROM public_transport_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time, route_name FROM public_transport_schedules JOIN public_transport_routes ON public_transport_schedules.route_id = public_transport_routes.route_id;
SELECT * FROM routes
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM routes
SELECT route_name, route_color FROM routes WHERE route_type = 'bus'
SELECT * FROM stops ORDER BY stop_name DESC
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops WHERE stop_zone = 1
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_type = 'bicycle'
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT route_name, route_color FROM routes WHERE route_id > 10
SELECT DISTINCT route_color FROM routes
SELECT s.schedule_date, r.route_name FROM schedules s JOIN routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'City Center';
SELECT driver_name, driver_license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id > 3 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM routes INNER JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id WHERE schedules.departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM stops WHERE stop_location = 'City Center' AND stop_name LIKE '%Main%' ORDER BY stop_id DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC, driver_license_number ASC;
